Game.Name: Mike Tyson Boxing (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: The 2-time undisputed world champ isn't about to let you go the distance. In fact, he's planning to do some serious damage to your face on the Game Boy? Advance system. Get up-close and personal with every one of Tyson's rib-crunching body shots, brain-rattling roundhouses, and jaw-bustin' uppercuts!http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/557187.html
